events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle with another car on the highway during rush hour.
The claim has been classified under the Auto Accident cluster following review of the initial report details.
An experienced claims agent has been assigned to manage and assist with the customer's vehicle accident claim.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and assured prompt service.
Additional documents requested including police report, vehicle registration, and photos of the damaged car.
Customer submitted all requested documents, including official police report and multiple photos of collision damage.
Investigation initiated to verify accident circumstances and assess damage to customer's vehicle.
Investigation completed confirming the details of the collision and assessing liability and damage costs.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the damage assessment, covering vehicle repair costs.
Customer responded to the settlement proposal indicating satisfaction with the offered amount and process.
Claim officially approved after confirmation of customer's acceptance of the proposed settlement.
Payment for vehicle repair costs issued to customerâ€™s bank account as per approved settlement.
Auto accident claim has been closed successfully following payment disbursement and customer confirmation.
